greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of permutations p of [n] such that n-p(i)+i >= 5 (mod n) for all i.
link: Shalosh B. Ekhad and Doron Zeilberger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
D. Zeilberger, Automatic Enumeration of Generalized Ménage Numbers
mathematica: a[n_] := Permanent[Table[If[i-j <= 0 && i-j > -5 || i-j > n-5, 0, 1], {i, 1, n}, {j, 1, n}]]; a[0] = 1; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 15}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 07 2016, adapted from Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Apr 20 2011
